en.loc: Yi-Reng Hall(Officeof Physical Education 操場
Yi-Reng Hall(Officeof Physical Education 操場

goal.en: 1. Understand the meaning and connotation of physical fitness and walking. 2. Implement the principles and skills of physical fitness and walking and various methods of physical training. 3. Establish the basic knowledge and concept of sports injury protection. 4. Experience a comfortable and pleasant exercise experience, strengthen cardiopulmonary function and maintain good physical fitness. 5. Establish the concept of leisure and regular exercise to promote physical and mental health.
goal.ch: 一、瞭解體適能健走的意義與內涵。 二、實施體適能健走的原則技巧與體能訓練的各種方法。 三、建立運動傷害防護的基本知識與觀念。 四、體會舒暢愉快的運動經驗，強化心肺功能及維持良好體適能。 五、建立休閒及規律運動觀念，促進身心健康。

content.en:
1. (1) Instructions on class progress and precautions (2) Introduce
physical fitness (3) Explain the importance and operation of warm-up
and cool-down exercises (4). Explain the concept of maximum heart
rate, heart rate detection method, how to use heart rate Rate to check exercise intensity.
2. Physical fitness test (pre-test): body composition measurement,
supine abdominal crunch, progressive endurance running, 12 minutes of walking.
3. (1) Know about walking (2) Introduce the body center posture (3)
Correct walking skills (4) Introduce the types of walking (basic walking, fitness walking, fast walking) ( 5) Field
practice (divided into upper body movement essentials and lower body movement essentials).
4. (1) Walking exercise prescription (2) 20-minute fitness walking
experience (3) Strengthening of lower limb muscles.
5. (1) 25-minutes fitness walking experience (2)
Strengthening of lower limb muscles.
6. (1) Group fitness walking experience (intermittent) (2)
Strengthening of lower limb muscles.
7. (1) Group fitness walking experience (intermittent) (2)
Experience deep stretching and relaxation.
8. (1) Group fitness walking experience (interval) (2) Core training.
9. (1) 30-minute fitness walking experience (2) Coordination and agility movement experience.
10. (1) 35-minute fitness walking experience (2) Strengthening of
upper limb muscles.
11. (1) Fatrek walking (2) Strengthening of upper limb muscles.
12. (1) Group fast walking experience (intermittent).
13. (1) 30 minutes of fast walking experience.
14. 40-minute campus walking experience.
15. Physical fitness test (post-test):body composition measurement,
supine abdominal crunch, progressive endurance running, 12 minutes of walking.
16. Physical education general knowledge test.
17. Make-up exam week.
18. Teachers teach flexibly.
content.ch:
一、(1) 上課進度及注意事項說明 (2)介紹體適能 (3)說明暖身與緩和運動的重要性及操作 (4).講解最大心跳率概念、心跳率檢測法、如何以心跳率來檢視運動強度。
二、體能檢測（前測）：身體組成之量測、仰臥捲腹、漸速耐力折返跑、12分鐘健走。
三、(1)認識健走 (2)介紹身體中心姿勢 (3)正確的健走技巧 (4)介紹健走的種類（基礎健走法、體適能健走法、快速健走法）(5)實地練習（分上半身動作要領與下半身動作要領）。
四、(1)健走運動處方(2)20分鐘體適能健走體驗 (3)下肢肌群加強。
五、(1)25分鐘體適能健走體驗 (2)下肢肌群加強。
六、(1)團體體適能健走體驗(間歇) (2)下肢肌群加強。
七、(1)團體體適能健走體驗(間歇) (2)體驗深度的伸展與放鬆。
八、(1)團體體適能健走體驗(間歇) (2)核心訓練。
九、(1)30分鐘體適能健走體驗 (2)協調與敏捷性動作體驗。
十、(1)35分鐘體適能健走體驗 (2)上肢肌群加強。
十一、(1)法特雷克健走 (2)上肢肌群加強。
十二、(1)團體快速健走體驗(間歇) 。
十三、(1)30分鐘快速健走體驗 。
十四、40分鐘校園健走體驗。
十五、體能檢測（後測）：身體組成之量測、仰臥捲腹、漸速耐力折返跑、12分鐘健走。
十六、體育常識測驗。
十七、補考週。
十八、教師彈性教學。

textbook.en: 1. Fang, J. L., Cai, X. H., Lin, J. L., Huang, G. C., Xie, J. C., Zhuo, J. C., Zhuo, J. L., Liu, Y. M., Huang, Y. J., and Wu, J. L. (2021). Theory and practice of health related physical fitness. Wagner Enterprises. 2. Fitness and Sports Association of the Republic of China (2012). 201
textbook.ch: 1. 方進隆、蔡秀華、林晉利、黃谷臣、謝錦城、卓俊辰、卓俊伶、劉影梅、黃永任、巫錦霖 (2021)。健康體適能：理論與實務（四版新修訂版）。華格那企業。 2. 中華民國健身運動協會（2012） 2012 年體適能健走與健身操研習指導手冊（201107）。

method.ch: 講授 個別指導 其他

grading.en: 1. Physical education general knowledge test: 20% 2. Attendance, diligence and learning spirit: 20% 3. Skills test: 60%
grading.ch: 一、體育常識測驗：20% 二、出席勤惰及學習精神：20% 三、術科測驗：60%

18. Teachers teach flexibly.

十八、教師彈性教學。
